entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deprecated package used by System.Security.Cryptography.Cng #93577
  • Improve regex source generator / compiler special-casing of whitespace #93573
    9.0.0
  • Outerloop test System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.Stress_WriteConcurrently_DoesntCrash crashing often #93569
  • Provide support for alternative rounding modes for division and remainder of division. #93568
    9.0.0
  • ILoggerProvider implementation - does not read the config settings #93562
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Base 64 Decoding Should Have An Auto-Padding Option #93552
  • [wasm] run browser-bench sample with https connection #93551
    9.0.0
  • nibblemapmacros do a linear scan #93550
    Future
  • NativeFileReference regression in .NET 8.0 #93538
    8.0.0
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated does not achieve TokenAccessLevels.Impersonate #93537
  • [NativeAOT] CQ regression vs JIT - torn loop in `NonPackedIndexOfValueType` #93536
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/UnmanagedCallersOnly/UnmanagedCallersOnlyNegativeTest/UnmanagedCallersOnlyNegativeTest.cmd #93534
  • Test failure Interop/SuppressGCTransition/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest.cmd #93533

Closed

  • .NET 7.0.12 contains old version of 'Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native' #93570
  • [mono][net7] Cherrypick fixes to build runtime with Xcode 15 #93009
    7.0.x
  • Slow flock on nfs file share #93207
    Future
  • ilc crash while compiling System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn tests #91885
    9.0.0
  • Improve error message for dictionary key converters not implementing `ReadAsPropertyName`/`WriteAsPropertyName`. #93406
    Future
  • Use new .NET logo in NuGet packages. #77695
    Future
  • Error with running or building on 7.0.401/2 #93325
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/ConstantFolding/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro.dll #93506
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/AssertionPropagation/ArrBoundElim/ArrBoundElim.dll #93508
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M12-Beta2/b71869/b71869/b71869.dll #93444
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09.5-PDC/b25815/b25815/b25815.dll #93443
  • Test failure: JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/ldc_mul_ovf_i4/ldc_mul_ovf_i4.dll #93441
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/rtchecks/overflow/overflow02_mul/overflow02_mul.dll #93442
    8.0.0
  • `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` allows construction without a diagnostic ID #93557
  • `dns.lookup.duration` should report `error.type` #92837
    8.0.0
  • Rename `dns.lookupS.duration` to `dns.lookup.duration` #92917
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP Metrics] Rename `server.socket.address` to `network.peer.address` #92956
    8.0.0
  • [Metrics] `error.type` doesn't report `Exception.FullName` #93302
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Cng.Tests.ECDsaCngPkcs8Tests.NoPlaintextExportAllowsEncryptedPkcs8 fails on Windows.Nano.1809.Amd64.Open #91971
    Future
  • [AOT] Add support for compressing output file #93510
  • CI Linux failure: SyncHttpHandler_HttpProtocolTests_Dribble.GetAsync_ResponseHasNormalLineEndings_Success #76678
    9.0.0
  • LibraryImport issue #93544
  • [API Proposal]: Add InvalidEnumArgumentException.ThrowIfUndefined #92071
  • [wasm] MT browser-bench crash #93398
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics - Prevent Instrument memory leak #93241
    Future
  • Test failure System.Tests.Int32Tests_GenericMath.op_CheckedMultiplyTest #93532
  • Process::TotalProcessorTime is about 42 times lower than expected on ARM64 Mac #91958
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Arm64/Unix] Use native memcpy/memmove for ARM64 as glibc 2.36 added optimizations #93579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [6.0] Bump Ubuntu 19.10 queues to 22.04 #93578
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle MultiRegNode in gtGetRegMask() #93576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Workloads test: Install the current app.ref pack also #93571
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Provide System.IO.Hashing package readme #93567
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable negative interop tests on GCStress. #93566
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add Label support in new ILGenerator #93565
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Emit/Call member references in new ILGenerator #93564
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/8.0] [hot reload][debugger] Resolve field types before use #93559
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [hot reload][debugger] Resolve field types before use #93558
    area-EnC-mono
  • [wasm] Fix Vector128 SIMD fmin and fmax #93556
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Optimizing arm64 trampolines #93547
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update MsQuic to 2.2.3 #93542
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Fix analysis of interface methods on generic types #93540
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • reuse existing resource file #93539
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 9.0.0
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • [release/7.0-staging] ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the pr… #93572
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [release/7.0][mono] Backport offsets-tool fixes for Xcode 15 compatibility #93543
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fixes not find assembly and pdb if it's not using the default path #92955
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • Improve DictionaryKeyTypeNotSupported error message #93553
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93554
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, blocking-clean-ci
  • [release/7.0-staging] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93505
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, blocking-clean-ci
  • [release/8.0] Mention Frozen.* types in PACKAGE.md for System.Collections.Immutable #93561
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93502
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, blocking-clean-ci
  • Make atomics `GenTreeIndir`-derived #93295
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix memory leak in MemoryCache #92550
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [browser] Disable HybridGlobalization failure #93560
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, blocking-clean-ci
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93528
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93530
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Use our now-split MarshalAs parsing to simplify our "forwarder with marshalling attributes" logic #93157
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93529
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Mention Frozen.* types in PACKAGE.md for System.Collections.Immutable #93541
    area-System.Collections
  • [browser] bench - separate scripts for memory snapshot #93548
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Sync offsets-tool/clang python bindings with upstream #93545
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix CMD_OBJECT_REF_GET_VALUES_BY_FIELD_TOKEN behavior #93363
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] refactor entropy #93466
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Make FailFast blocks cold (GS cookies) #93429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve logging on FirstDayOfWeek failures #93380
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add missing ArrayPool returns to failure branches #92511
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete outdated workaround #93525
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Optimize constant range tests #93521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Set bbJumpKind and bbJumpDest during block initialization #93415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorizes IndexOfMin/Max/Magnitude #93469
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable Adding Disabled Tests Skip Reason to their XML Results Log From issues.targets #93492
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix crossgen2 invocation error under sourcebuild #93450
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `add_link_options` and `target_link_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use the improved vectorization algorithm for binary and ternary TensorPrimitives operations #93409
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm] Runtime tests - fix CI build #93486
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.DirectoryServices.Protocols package readme #93518
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] logging improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix test build error when BuildAsStandalone is true #93457
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix CodeGen::instGen_Set_Reg_To_Imm #93411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
